header.description: This plug-in includes steps to automate the installation of IBM UrbanCode Deploy plugins.

step-type.name: Install Plugin
step-type.description: Install an Automation or Source Configuration plugin into IBM UrbanCode Deploy

property-ui.label: UCD Sever
property-ui.description: Complete URL to the IBM UrbanCode Deploy server where the plugin will be installed. Example: https://localhost:8443

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: UrbanCode Deploy username with plugin installation privileges.

property-ui.label: Plugin Path
property-ui.description: Path to plugin you wish to install.

property-ui.label: Type
property-ui.description: Select whether the plugin is an automation or source configuration plugin.

property-ui.label: Accept All Certificates
property-ui.description: Select to accept all SSL Certificates.
